```{r load_package, echo = FALSE, results='hide', warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
devtools::load_all()
library(kableExtra)
```

##Getting Raster Data 

```{r echo = FALSE}
text_tbl <- data.frame(
Data = c("Cropland Data Layers", "National Elevation Dataset", "National Landcover Dataset", "Koppen Climate Classification"),
 Source = c("USDA", "USGS", "USGS", "Center for Climate Change and Infectious Disease"),
 Function = c("getNHD( )", "getHUC( )", "getWaterbodies( )", "getRoads( )")
) 

rownames(text_tbl) = paste0(c(1:4), ".")

text_tbl$Function <- cell_spec(text_tbl$Function, background ="lightgray", color = "black")

kable(text_tbl, escape = F, format = "html") %>%
   kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "responsive"))
```

### Crop Layers form USDA

```{r CLD, message = FALSE}
CLD = getCLD(clip_unit = list("University of Alabama", 10, 10), year = 2016)
str(CLD, max = 1)
```

### Get Koppen Classification

```{r Koppen, message=FALSE}
kop = getKoppen(state = "CA", county = c("Santa Barbara", "Ventura", "San Luis Obispo"), boundary = T)
str(kop, max = 1)
```
